thread.title: Charlotte Crosby sends pregnancy rumours into overdrive as fans spot her 'rounded belly' in new Instagram video
thread.title_full: Charlotte Crosby sends pregnancy rumours into overdrive as fans spot her 'rounded belly' in new Instagram video

title: Charlotte Crosby sends pregnancy rumours into overdrive as fans spot her 'rounded belly' in new Instagram video
text:
'A baby bear?' Charlotte Crosby sends pregnancy rumours into overdrive as fans spot her ’rounded belly’ in new Instagram video 
Followers are convinced she may be expecting her first child with boyfriend Stephen Bear By Louise Randell, Senior Showbiz Reporter 26th February 2017, 10:12 pm Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments CHARLOTTE Crosby has fuelled pregnancy rumours by sharing a video which appears to show her sporting a more rounded tummy. 
She sent fans into a spin tonight as they speculated whether she may be expecting a baby with boyfriend Stephen Bear. Insatgram 3 Charlotte Crosby has fuelled pregnancy rumours 
The former Geordie Shore star uploaded a clip to Instagram showing her getting ready for a night out. 
In the clip, she is seen wearing a black belt over a beige dress and followers are convinced they can see a hint of a rounded belly under the outfit. 
Charlotte captioned the footage: “Getting ready tonight… Big secret for you girls…” Instagram The TV star is currently dating Stephen Bear Charlotte Crosby shares video of herself getting ready for a night out 
She went on to tease fans about a clothing deal, but her followers were more interested in speculation about a potential pregnancy. 
They flooded her Instagram page with messages asking her whether she is set to become a mum. 
One wrote: "I think that you are pregnant," and another added: "She's definitely pregnant." Related stories slick mick Sir Mick Jagger spent pre-Oscars party hosted by Colin Firth flirting with Argentinian actress 44 years his junior DARK PAST Who is Casey Affleck and what is the sexual harassment scandal he is embroiled in? THANKING THE ACADEMY Here's everything you need to get ready for Oscars night BYE-KARD? Here are the updates on #TeamJennifer #TEAMTOM Who has Tom Jones picked for his group in The Voice? Here are the updates on #TeamTom #TEAMWILL Who has will.i.am picked for his group in The Voice? Here are the updates on #TeamWill 'HE EMPTIED HIS NUTS!' The Jump's Davina McCall sends everyone into a fit of giggles with dirty X-rated joke A NEW CRIB FOR BEY'S BABIES Beyonce and Jay Z to splash out on £85m Hollywood mega-mansion before birth of their twins 
A third wrote: "Are u pregnant?" 
Many followers simply asked the star: "Pregnant?" 
It comes just days after she sparked baby gossip at the BRIT Awards by sharing a selfie which showed her with a hand placed protectively on her belly. 
She has been linked to her Just Tattoo of Us co-host Bear over the last few weeks, but she has since claimed they are just friends. 
At the BRIT Awards, she exclusively told The Sun: “He is my co-presenter on my brand new show Just Tatoo Of Us which starts on April 3.
